com.jimetevenard.xslt

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jimetevenard.xslt.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object

    Driver

    This is the entry point to the Java API. It processes the scenari file via a ScenariParser, and execute the compilation with a XSLTGenerator.
    Author:
    jimetevenard

    • Method Detail

      • setDirForIntermediates

        public void setDirForIntermediates(java.io.File dirForIntermediates)
        For debug purpose, you might want to have a look to the intermediate generated XSL.
        If this param is set, the intermediate XSL will be stored there.
        Parameters:
        dirForIntermediates - : (must be an existing directory)

      • setLicencedSaxon

        public void setLicencedSaxon(boolean licencedSaxon)
        Set to true to use Saxon PE/EE functionalities.
        The you need to buildthis project with SaxonEE/PE dependency + licence
        Parameters:
        licencedSaxon -

      • launch

        public void launch()
            throws GenerationException
        Once you've built a Driver and eventually set dirForIntermediates and licencedSaxon, use this method to launch the generation process.
        Throws:
        GenerationException - : if an error occur during the compilation.
